WorkItem.ClosedComment:
As part of our move to GitHub, we're closing our CodePlex suggestions and asking that people move them to the GitHub issue tracker for further discussion.  Some feature requests may already be active on GitHub, so please make sure to look for an existing issue before filing a new one.

You can find our GitHub issue tracker here:
https://github.com/microsoft/typeScript/issues
WorkItem.Description: Add an option to detect when a variable is implicitly typed as 'any' and issue errors/warnings

Comments.Message: Thanks for reporting these issues. I'll make sure we track these to get them fixed.
The style settings are currently unsupported and experimental.  If we do decide to move forward with making them 'feature quality', I'll take a look.

We won't be supporting style settings for v1

** Closed by RyanCavanaugh 02/19/2013 4:41PM
So why is this bug closed then? Will v1 be the last version ever released for TypeScript???
OK, changing this into a suggestion for v2.
